Airport data

Source: vignettes/airports.Rmd
airports.Rmd

The airport data in the flightsbr package is downloaded from Brazil’s Civil Aviation Agency (ANAC).

  • Airports data cover all airports and aerodromes registered in Brazil’s Civil Aviation Agency (ANAC). It covers detailed information on….[mention a few key variables].

Data dictionary: the data dictionary for public airports can be found at . The data dictionary for private airports can be found at .

Now we can load some libraries we’ll use in this vignette:

library(flightsbr)
library(ggplot2)
# library(geobr)

Download data of all airports:

# download data
airports_all <- flightsbr::read_airports(type = 'all', showProgress = FALSE)
airports_prv <- flightsbr::read_airports(type = 'private', showProgress = FALSE)
airports_pbl <- flightsbr::read_airports(type = 'public', showProgress = FALSE)

# plot
# brazil <- geobr::read_country()

ggplot() +
  # geom_sf(data=brazil, color='gray') +
  geom_point(data=airports_all, aes(x=longitude, y=latitude), size=.5 , alpha=.4) +
  theme_void()
